channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A cruel summer looms, but here’s why JPMorgan still expects a higher S&P 500 finish this year
item.description: The mood will improve later in 2025 as tariff angst eases, and focus turns to tax cuts and deregulation

item.title: Yes, this stock market is hard to predict — but it always is. Here’s what’s even harder.
item.description: It’s difficult to overcome “hindsight bias” — thinking that investing was easier than it really was.

item.title: Samuel Adams’s parent company points to gains in light beer as tastes shift from craft brews
item.description: Boston Beer Co. says that the company faces long-term challenges.

item.title: A wobbly consumer is one reason investors shouldn’t be tempted to buy stock-market dips, says BofA
item.description: Investors should not be tempted back into the stock market until certain criteria are met, says BofA.

item.title: It’s time to start nibbling on Lowe’s and Williams-Sonoma’s stocks, analyst says
item.description: Patient investors will see the benefits of taking small purchases of these stocks.

item.title: Pro Talks: Top chip analyst on navigating the tech trade as tariff uncertainty grows
item.description: Jordan Klein, tech sector specialist at Mizuho Securities, joins CNBC's Kristina Partsinevelos to discuss which semiconductor stocks could be hardest ...

item.title: This online brokerage is a buy in this uncertain market environment, Goldman Sachs says
item.description: The firm estimated that Charles Schwab's earnings per share will compound at a 25% compound annual growth rate, or CAGR, through 2027.

item.title: This fintech stock is attractively valued and can rally nearly 40%, Citizens says
item.description: "SoFi is at an inflection point, with substantial earnings potential that we believe the market is currently undervaluing," the firm said.

item.title: RBC upgrades this consumer giant after earnings led to a 'clearing event'
item.description: Consumer goods giant P&G on Thursday reported quarterly earnings that beat estimates, but revenue that disappointed, leading shares lower.

item.title: Trump insists bond market tumult didn't influence tariff pause: 'I wasn't worried'
item.description: "I wasn't worried," Trump said in a Time magazine interview during which he was asked about financial market tumult.

item.title: Hasbro Soars 13.26%: What’s Behind the Surge?
item.description: As of this writing, Hasbro (HAS) shares have gained $6.99 per share or 13.26%, with a current price of $59.68. The toy maker has been making headlines...
